description:
The ultimate Handpan simulator is now available on Nintendo Switch™

Unlike most other instruments playing the handpan on Nintendo Switch™ is really easy to learn, compose and play amazing music for your your friends and family.

Play Handpan,  also known as a hang drum, with either the touch screen or Joy-Con™ and easily change the tone or the scale of the handpan and produce your own musical creations.

You can also choose between the Solo or Duo mode (two handpans)
name: Handpan
